PHRASE.LANG: Your hat will light up the mood in any room, just make sure to stay away from any flammable materials. [#Legal]
Ce chapeau a le pouvoir de mettre l'ambiance n'importe où. Mais ne vous approchez pas de matériaux inflammables. [#Legal]
Dieser Hut bringt Stimmung in jeden Raum. Halte dich aber immer vor brennbaren Materialien fern. [#Legal]
Con questo cappello incendierai qualsiasi party (ma non avvicinarti troppo a materiali infiammabili). [#Legal]
Este sombrero te ayudará a animar cualquier ambiente, aunque deberás asegurarte de no acercarlo a materiales inflamables. [#Legal]
언제 어디서나 축제 분위기를 낼 수 있는 모자입니다. 주변의 화기에 주의하세요. [#Legal]
Your hat will light up the mood in any room, just make sure to stay away from any flammable materials. [#Legal]
這帽子能提升任何房間的氣氛，你只需遠離易燃物品就可以了。 [#Legal]
